title: SET_PED_MELEE_COMBAT_LIMITS
content:
0x8E51EC29// SetPedMeleeCombatLimits
void SET_PED_MELEE_COMBAT_LIMITS(int primaryCount, int secondaryCount, int populationPedCount);Parameters:primaryCount: The number of peds that engage in combat (default: 1)secondaryCount: The number of peds that engage in taunting (default: 3)populationPedCount: The maximum number of population peds (ambient and scenario) that can engage in combat (default: 3)Override the limits on the number and types of melee combatants. The game is limited to at most ten combatants among the three types: primary, secondary, and observers.This native infers the number of observers based on the primary and secondary counts.
codeBlocks:
// SetPedMeleeCombatLimits
void SET_PED_MELEE_COMBAT_LIMITS(int primaryCount, int secondaryCount, int populationPedCount);
